overview: Tony is fascinated by Neisy during the Rolling Stones concert in Havana. As he follows her around, he decides to make a secret documentary about her life. He infiltrates her house and starts recording her privacy from under the bed. Thus, he becomes a witness to Neisy’s generational conflicts with her mother, her bisexuality and her ways to earn a living. This privileged approach makes him fall in love with her. But one day he will be discovered and the story will change radically.
title: I Want to Make a Movie
